metadata.title: opentargets/pis: v25.2.0
metadata.description:
This is the PIS version used to create the Open Targets 25.03 data release.

What's Changed

  • Merge new PIS from fork by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/pis/pull/141
  • Sane path structure for releases by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/pis/pull/144

Full Changelog: https://github.com/opentargets/pis/compare/v24.7.3...v25.2.0

metadata.title: Draft genome sequence of Alicyclobacillus acidocaldarius strain LH1 isolated from an Andean solfataric field
metadata.description:
Annotation data for assembly GCA_040779485.1 available in the GenBank database.

Annotation of assembly GCA_040779485.1 using the bioinformatics programs CRISPRCasFinder, mobileOG-db v1.1.3. and VirSorter v2.2.4. The results of the programs are made available through their output documents.

creators.name: Blamey, Jenny
creators.affiliation: Fundación Científica y Cultural Biociencia, Santiago, Chile

metadata.title: opentargets/platform-etl-backend: v25.0.0
metadata.description:
This is the ETL version used for Open Targets 25.03 release.

What's Changed

  • Update target safety and pharmacogenomics by @mbdebian in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/337
  • fix(evidence score): fixing score expression for validation lab by @DSuveges in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/341
  • Release 2406 by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/342
  • Migrate to github actions by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/345
  • chore(molecule): set drugType nulls to Unknown by @ireneisdoomed in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/347
  • feat(uniprot_variants): add variantId as an unique field by @ireneisdoomed in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/349
  • Release 24 09 by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/353
  • remove conda default channel by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/355
  • feat: adding new evidence set to config by @DSuveges in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/356
  • add variantId to pharmacogenomics by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/357
  • 3361 remove classic aotf aggs data by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/344
  • reduce number of partitions for facets and interactions by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/359
  • update tsv input to parquet by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/360
  • Changes made to recover missing literature matches by @vivienho in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/352
  • Add Variant Search by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/358
  • 3499 sequence ontology by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/354
  • update json map input to parquet by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/361
  • Revert "3499 sequence ontology" by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/364
  • 3490 update input format by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/362
  • 3091 update csv map input to parquet by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/363
  • Fix homolog load by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/365
  • feat: add function for hashing long variant ids by @vivienho in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/366
  • Revert "feat: add function for hashing long variant ids" by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/367
  • formatted hash variant id by @remo87 in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/368
  • feat: add tss column to target index by @vivienho in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/369
  • Sane path structure for releases by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/370
  • 3561 study search by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/372
  • Fix some paths by @javfg in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/373
  • fix: change values of strand in the addTss function by @vivienho in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/371
  • select instead of with column for the search index by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/374
  • drop cohort from searchable study fields by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/375
  • chore: removing references to ot_genetics from configuration and etl by @DSuveges in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/378
  • 3561 study search by @jdhayhurst in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/376

New Contributors

  • @vivienho made their first contribution in https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/pull/352

Full Changelog: https://github.com/opentargets/platform-etl-backend/compare/v24.1.1...v25.0.0

metadata.title: The grasshoppers and crickets (Orthoptera) of the Socotra Archipelago (Yemen): a comprehensive overview and a description of a new Oecanthus Tree Cricket (Oecanthidae)
metadata.description: This paper presents all available information on the Orthoptera of the Socotra Archipelago, an area well-known for its endemic flora and fauna. General information is provided about the climate and geology of the Socotra Archipelago. The various habitats where grasshoppers have been found are described and illustrated, followed by a concise history of Orthoptera research on Socotra. Besides an identification key to the species, additional information about the material examined, taxonomy, diagnostic notes, distribution and occurrence, including maps, habitat, biology and bioacoustics, is provided for each species. In total, 65 Orthoptera species are reported here from Socotra, Abd el Kuri, Samha and Darsa, including Oecanthus castaneus Felix & Bouwman, sp. nov. and two unknown species assigned to Ectatoderus. Of these 65 species, 30 (46%) are endemic to the Socotra Archipelago. Re-descriptive notes on Acrotylus innotatus Uvarov, 1933 and Glomeremus capitatus Uvarov, 1957 are provided, including the description of the female of the latter species and the male of Oxytruxalis ensis (Burr, 1899). Acrotylus innotatus Uvarov, 1933, Dictyophorus griseus (Reiche & Fairmaire, 1850), Eumodicogryllus chivensis (Tarbinsky, 1930), Ochrilidia geniculata (Bolívar, 1913), Sphingonotus rubescens (Walker, 1870) and S. balteatus (Serville, 1838) are recorded for the first time from the Archipelago. Bioacoustics are presented for: Ochrilidia socotrae Massa, 2009, Stenohippus socotranus (Popov, 1957), Sphingonotus ganglbaueri Krauss, 1907, S. insularis (Popov, 1957), Acheta rufopictus Uvarov, 1957, Eumodicogryllus chivensis (Tarbinsky, 1930), Ectatoderus guichardi Gorochov, 1993 as well as two other species assigned to Ectatoderus, Oecanthus castaneus Felix & Bouwman, sp. nov., Ruspolia aff. R. basiguttata (Bolívar, 1906) and Pachysmopoda abbreviata (Taschenberg, 1883). Red List Assessments for 29 endemic species have been prepared including Oxytruxalis ensis (Burr, 1899) (Critically Endangered, CR), Cataloipus brunneri (Kirby, 1910) (Endangered, EN) and Glomeremus capitatus Uvarov, 1957, Phaneroptila insularis Uvarov, 1957, Phaulotypus granti Burr, 1899, Socotracris kleukersi Felix & Desutter-Grandcolas, 2012, Socotrella monstrosa Popov, 1957 and Xenephias socotranus Kevan, 1973 (all Vulnerable, VU).
